definition: to gather together/to investigate/to entangle/to correct
mistake/wrong/bad/interlocking/complex/to grind/to polish/to alternate/to stagger/to miss/to let slip/to evade/to inlay with gold or silver

sentences.english: In teaching college English writing, its of great significance to encourage students to self-correct errors in writing.
sentences.chinese: 在大学英语写作教学中，倡导学生自我纠错非常重要。

sentences.english: Exchange your exercise books with your neighbor and correct each other's mistakes.
sentences.chinese: 把你的练习本和同桌交换，互相纠错。

sentences.english: In this paper, a digital signature scheme constructed with error-correcting codes is first presented.
sentences.chinese: 本文首次提出了一种基于纠错码的数字签名方案。

sentences.english: Finally, we use error correcting coding to improve secure algorithm.
sentences.chinese: 最后，利用纠错码理论进一步改进水印算法。

sentences.english: Teachers follow the principle of student priority in the course of error correction.
sentences.chinese: 在纠错中教师应尽量给予学生独立修正偏误的优先权。

sentences.english: A general method of automatic error detecting and correcting for spelling English words is summarized.
sentences.chinese: 概述了英文单词拼写自动侦错与纠错的一般方法。

sentences.english: It also synchronizes and establishes an agreement on procedures for error recovery and control of data integrity.
sentences.chinese: 它还对纠错和数据整合的过程进行同步并达成协议。

sentences.english: Error correcting code mainly includes block code and convolutional code.
sentences.chinese: 纠错码主要有分组码和卷积码两种。

sentences.english: An identification scheme based on a generator matrix of error-correcting codes over GF(q);
sentences.chinese: 该方案根据移动信道性能的变化自适应地选择纠错码。

sentences.english: Based oh the codes, a fast single byte-error correction scheme for main memory is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 基于最小方阵码，本文给出一种快速内存纠错方案。

sentences.english: Introduce the ECC(Error Correction Code) into the field of information hiding in binary images.
sentences.chinese: 将通信领域的纠错码技术引入到信息隐藏中。

sentences.english: To do that, switch over to the debug perspective and test your updated application from there.
sentences.chinese: 切换到纠错透视图并在此测试更新过的应用程序。

sentences.english: Once the necessary corrections are made, translated documents are finally delivered to the manufacturer.
sentences.chinese: 完成必要的纠错之后，翻译文档最后提交给制造商。

sentences.english: A digital signature Public-key cryptosystem based on error correcting codes is presented in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出了基于纠错码的一类公钥体制数字签名方案。

sentences.english: RS(Reed-Solomon)code is being used widely because of its powerful error correction capability.
sentences.chinese: RS码由于具有优良的纠错能力而得到广泛应用。

sentences.english: At last, the relation between the capacity of subliminal channel and the parameters of the code used in the system is described.
sentences.chinese: 同时给出了容量与所采用纠错码请参数之间的关系。

definition: (abbr. for 嘗試錯誤|尝试错误) trial and error/failure
to correct/to amend/to put right/correction/CL:個|个[ge4]
to think back over sth/to review/to revisit/to rethink/reflection/reassessment
to screen/to discriminate/to reexamine a case/screening (of applicants etc)
(after completing a game of chess) to replay the game, analyzing the players' moves/(stock market) to resume trading
